ping.desc: Check if the bot is active

thmlink.desc:
Link your TryHackMe account to the bot (DMs only!).
Uses your Discord token which can be found on your profile.

contributors.desc: Show a list of the bot's contributors

github.desc: Display a link to the bot Github repo

help.title: **__Help:__**
help.overview:
Welcome to the Gameathon Hacking section!
This bot records your points from TryHackMe and HackTheBox, should you choose to link your accounts.
Use the `thmlink` and `htblink` commands with your account identifiers for each site to track your points!

errors.noDM: Please send that message to the bot in a DM!
errors.botBlocked:
I can't DM you <@{}>!
Please make sure you don't have me blocked, and that people can send messages to you from this server.
errors.noToken: You have not added your token after the command.
errors.alreadyLinked: You have already linked your account for this site
errors.failedLink: Something went wrong. Your account has not been linked

success.linked: Your account for this site is now linked!
